name: Mr. Pudding
description:
WASD to move, Space to jump.

Left-click to shoot.

Collect pudding for ammo and destroy as many pink slimes as you can before you lose your 3 hearts!  Hint:  Boxes will blow up if they hit the ground and always spawn enemies.
